slide.title: Casting Objects
slide.example:
<?php
	class Country {
		function set_name($name) {
			$this->name = $name;
		}
	}

	$jurop = new Country;
	$dutchieland = new Country;
	$dutchieland->set_name('The Netherlands');

	echo (int) $jurop, "\n";
	echo (int) $dutchieland, "\n";
? >
Notice: Object of class Country could not be converted to integer in - on line 13 1 Notice: Object of class Country could not be converted to integer in - on line 14 1
